info.name: TTE-collection
info.description: In this collection you will be able to test all the endpoints for the 7 epics

request.description:
**As** an administrator

**I want to** be able to register new users in the platform.

AC #1: Email is unique  
AC # 2: Username is unique  
AC # 3: Valid Role  
AC # 4: Role administrator/Successful  
AC # 5: Role Employee/Fail

**As** a shopper

**I want to** be able to register in the platform.

AC #1: Email is unique  
AC # 2: Username is unique

**As** a user

**I want to** be able to login in the platform.

AC #1:  Login user with valid role  
AC # 2: Session record  
AC # 3: Avoid Multiple sessions  
AC # 4: Invalid login (log in with invalid data)

**As** a user

**I want to** be able to login in the platform.

AC #1:  Login user with valid role  
AC # 2: Session record  
AC # 3: Avoid Multiple sessions  
AC # 4: Invalid login (log in with invalid data)

**As** a user

**I want to** be able to login in the platform.

AC #1:  Login user with valid role  
AC # 2: Session record  
AC # 3: Avoid Multiple sessions  
AC # 4: Invalid login (log in with invalid data)

**As** a user

**I want to** be able to logout the platform.

AC #1:  Successfully logout  
AC #2:  Unsuccessfully logout (user not logged)  
AC # 3: Session record

item.name: E03 Products and Categories FAKESTORE API

request.description: As an user (employee or shopper), you can get all the categories

item.description:
This epic comprises two features:

1. F01: List of Products
2. F02: List of Categories
    

These features entail retrieving products and categories from the fakestoreapi and storing them in the database. Although there is no specific endpoint or path designated for this purpose, according to the acceptance criteria:

The user must have the capability to view all categories and products stored in the database.

request.description:
As an user, I want to browse and explore the variety of products.  
Can order by :

price :  
\- asc (lowest to highest)  
\- desc (highest to lowest)

title :  
\- asc (Alphabetic order)  
\- desc (reverse)

AC #1: Product Display Page  
AC #2: Pagination for Product Exploration

As an user , I want a page that displays products filtered according to the category selected.  
  
AC #1: Category Filter Page  
AC #2: Filter Products by Category  
AC #3: Display Filtered Products (Front)  
AC #4: Easy Navigation (Front)

As an user,

I want to view detailed information about a specific product

Path :  
api/store/products/{product_id}

AC #1: Product Detail Page  
AC #2: Product Photograph  
AC #3: Detailed Information  
AC #4: Inventory Control

As an user I want to view comments and ratings of a product.

api/store/products/{product_id}/reviews  
AC #1: Reviews and Ratings Section

As an user I want to add comments along with ratings for a product.  
api/store/products/{product_id}/reviews/add

AC #2: Add a Review and Rating

item.name: F06.1 Get Wishlist of an user

request.description:
As an user I can see a section with the wishlist.  
path : api/user/wishlist

AC #1: Wishlist Section

item.name: F06.3 Delete product from the Wishlist
Coupons

request.description: As an admin I have the ability to view all coupons
As an admin I have the ability to add new coupons
As an admin I have the ability to delete existing coupons

item.description: As an admin, I have the ability to view all the coupons, add new coupons, and delete existing coupons

request.description: As an user , I want a page that displays the products I've selected before making a purchase
As a shopper, I want the ability to add products to the cart.

item.name: Delete some units of a product

request.description: As a shopper I wan the ability to manage (remove) products from the cart

When the user wants to apply a coupon or discount

Then the user can input a coupon code, triggering a request to apply the coupon or discount to their order.

item.name: Review Jobs (F01-F02)

request.description:
As an admin , I want to be able to Approve jobs that Employees create.  
path : /api/reviewJob?type="category"  
where type: String identifying what to approve/decline (category, product)  
AC #1: approve  
AC #2: Decline
As an admin , I want to be able to view all jobs that require approval from my side.

item.description: In this folder we have the two feature F01 Review Job, where the admin approve or deny the pending jobs, and the F02 View approval Jobs, where the admin view all pending approval jobs.

request.description:
As an admin, I can create products.  
AC #1

Given title, price, description, category, image, rating And inventory of a product

And Token in bearer token to identify role

Then create a new product in the database

If Role is Admin, the state of product must be approved
As an employee can create a product, and the state of the product will be Pending.

As a Superadmin, Employee, Shopper

I want to view all products

So, they can see all products available and with inventory

As a Superadmin, Employee, Shopper

I want to view all products

So, they can see all products available and with inventory

As a Superadmin, employee

I want to update field of a specific product

So, I can modify attributes over a single product.

  
AC #1:

Given mandatory ID

And optional product fields

Then update the respective in the DB

As a Superadmin, employee  
I want to update field of a specific product  
So, I can modify attributes over a single product.

AC #1:  
Given mandatory ID  
And optional product fields  
Then update the respective in the DB

As an admin , I can remove a product .

AC #1: 

**Given** an Id of a product

**Then** remove the product with the Id given in the DB if the role of the user is Admin

As an employee I can create the request to delete a product.  
AC #2:

Given an Id of a product

Then change the state of the product to Pending to delete, only if the role of the user is an employee
As the admin you can get all the categories
As an user (employee or shopper), you can get all the categories
